entity.description: Ruteo de canales por modulo origen
Entidad para las transacciones de currency rate

staticScripts.name: ValidaOTP
staticScripts.description: Valida Si la OTP Existe y es valida

staticScripts.name: SeparaTokenPK
staticScripts.description: Separa los campos internos del TokenPK y los entrega como un composite
staticScripts.script:
tokenPK.TipoDoc = substring(TokenPK, 0, 1)//sess.assigments.transferencias.webservice.user.document.type//sess.assigments.cardParameters.tipoDocumento tokenPK.NumDoc = substring(TokenPK, 1, 12)//padRight(sess.assigments.transferencias.webservice.user.document.number, 32, 12)//padRight(sess.assigments.cardParameters.documento, 32, 12) tokenPK.KeyVig = substring(TokenPK, 13, 1)//'0' tokenPK.Perfil = substring(TokenPK, 14, 2)//'00' tokenPK.TimeInput = substring(TokenPK, 16, 8)//' ' tokenPK.Clave3DS = substring(TokenPK, 24, 1)//' ' tokenPK.RespConf = substring(TokenPK, 25, 1)//'0' tokenPK.BeufTrans = substring(TokenPK, 26, 1)//'0' tokenPK.BeufPagos = substring(TokenPK, 27, 1)//'0' tokenPK.DocOrig = substring(TokenPK, 28, 1)//' ' tokenPK.Tran = substring(TokenPK, 29, 3)//' ' tokenPK.TranValDebin = substring(TokenPK, 32, 1)//' ' tokenPK.AppOrig = substring(TokenPK, 33, 1)//'Z' tokenPK.TimeExit = substring(TokenPK, 34, 12)//' ' tokenPK.InvOnl = substring(TokenPK, 46, 1)//' ' tokenPK.SxvMob = substring(TokenPK, 47, 1)//' ' tokenPK.EmpTel = substring(TokenPK, 48, 1)//' ' tokenPK.TcPmc = substring(TokenPK, 49, 1)//'N' tokenPK.DobleFactor = substring(TokenPK, 50, 1)//' ' tokenPK.UsoHbar = substring(TokenPK, 51, 1)//' ' tokenPK.IndDeu = substring(TokenPK, 52, 1)//'N' tokenPK.Responder = substring(TokenPK, 53, 1)//' '
return tokenPK

staticScripts.name: MapeaConceptoTransaccion
staticScripts.description: Mapea el campo transaction.concept del request de payments para TRF3.0
staticScripts.script:
if (!isIn('PCT,CCT,ECT,DCT', concept) && //Tipos para TRF 3.0 !isIn('VAR', concept) && //Tipos para TRF Pull !isIn('ALQ,CUO,EXP,FAC,PRE,SEG,HON,VAR,HAB,BRH,BRN,SON,ROP,SIS,APC,ESE', concept)){ //Tipos para TRF Push salida = '-' }else{ mapeo.PCT = 'K' //Pago con transferencia mapeo.CCT = 'J' //Compra con transferencia mapeo.ECT = 'N' //Extraccin con transferencia mapeo.DCT = 'L' //Devolucion con transferencia
mapeo.ALQ = '1' //Alquileres mapeo.CUO = '2' //Cuota mapeo.EXP = '3' //Expensas mapeo.FAC = '4' //Factura mapeo.PRE = '5' //Prestamo mapeo.SEG = '6' //Seguro mapeo.HON = '7' //Honorarios
mapeo.VAR = '8' //Transferencia Pull o Varios Push
mapeo.HAB = '9' //Haberes mapeo.BRH = 'C' //Bienes Registrables H mapeo.BRN = 'D' //Bienes Registrables N mapeo.SON = 'E' //Suscripcin Obligatoria mapeo.ROP = 'F' //Reintegro Obras mapeo.SIS = 'G' //Siniestro de Seguros mapeo.APC = 'H' //Aportes de Capital mapeo.ESE = 'I' //Estado Expropiacin
salida = mapeo."${concept}" }

staticScripts.name: SeparaTokenXL
staticScripts.description: Separa los campos internos del TokenXL y los entrega como un composite
staticScripts.script:
tokenXL.XLNombreTit = substring(TokenXL, 0, 64) tokenXL.XLCuit1 = substring(TokenXL, 64, 11) tokenXL.XLCuit2 = substring(TokenXL, 75, 11) tokenXL.XLCuit3 = substring(TokenXL, 86, 11) tokenXL.XLBcoDest = substring(TokenXL, 97, 22) tokenXL.XLBcoOrig = substring(TokenXL, 119, 4) tokenXL.XLUserFld = substring(TokenXL, 123, 7)
return tokenXL

staticScripts.name: LogErrorRest
staticScripts.description: Registra en Log errores de Validaciones en Endpoint Rest

staticScripts.name: SeparaTokenZO
staticScripts.description: Separa los campos internos del TokenZO y los entrega como un composite
staticScripts.script:
tokenZO.ZOAuthCode ?= substring(TokenZO, 0, 6) //tokenZO.ZOQrId ?= substring(TokenZO, 6, 6) tokenZO.ZOAdminName ?= substring(TokenZO, 12, 2) tokenZO.ZOTransfOrder ?= substring(TokenZO, 14, 1) tokenZO.ZOWalletName ?= substring(TokenZO, 15, 6) tokenZO.ZOWalletCuit ?= substring(TokenZO, 21, 11) tokenZO.ZOAdqName ?= substring(TokenZO, 32, 6) tokenZO.ZOAdqCuit ?= substring(TokenZO, 38, 11) tokenZO.ZOAcctInfCbu ?= substring(TokenZO, 49, 22) tokenZO.ZOAcctInfName ?= substring(TokenZO, 71, 23) tokenZO.ZOAcctInfCuit ?= substring(TokenZO, 94, 11) tokenZO.ZOAcctInfDocTyp ?= substring(TokenZO, 105, 1) tokenZO.ZOAcctInfDocNum ?= substring(TokenZO, 106, 8) tokenZO.ZOTerminalId ?= substring(TokenZO, 114, 6)
return tokenZO
